steps.name: User have to launch the brainzo application through chrome browser using localhost:300
User Successfully Navigate to Home page
Click the Signup button
Enter the Valid EmailAddress in Text field
Click the Submit button
Enter the OTP that has been sent to Registerd Email Address
Click verify OTP button
User Successfully Entered their OTP for verifciation

elements.name: Validate the working of Login Functionality of Mentor

steps.name: User have to launch the brainzo application through chrome browser via using localhost:300
User have to  click the login button
User  enter valid username and valid password
Click login button once again
User should be navigate to Add course page
User have to launch the brainzo application through chrome browser via using localhost:300
User successfully get login as mentor
User has navigate to add course page
User have to fill the course details in corresponding text field
Click Addcourse button

elements.name: To validate Login functionality by giving valid credentials

steps.name: User have to Launch the Brainzo application through chrome browser via using localhost:3000
User click the login button
User have to enter valid username and valid password
Click login button again
User should be in a valid credential page

elements.name: To validate the working of Search functionality

steps.name: User have to Launch the Brainzo application through chrome browser via using localhost:3000
Enter in to the valid page by using valid credentials
Enter the course name which you want to learn
Click search icon to search that course
User should navigate to particular course page

elements.name: To Validate the working of Enroll functionality

steps.name: User have to Launch the Brainzo application through chrome browser via using localhost:3000
User Select the particular Course
User have to click enroll button
click Show QR from payment dialogbox
User is Enrolled with selected course

Click Start Learning button
Click on the Video player button
Add some comments if your user want to share their feedback
Click send Button
Comment is Added

Login as learner by providing valid credentials
click the dropdown menu option
select the my courses
courses which are enrolled by learner is displayed
